about_the_game:
EverQuest® II The Shadow Odyssey™ is the fifth expansion for the critically acclaimed EverQuest II franchise. New players and veterans alike can journey through a massive amount of exquisite content unlike anything ever before seen in EverQuest II. The Shadow Odyssey stretches well beyond the fantasy realm and propels the EverQuest II world into a new era of excitement and adventure.

The Shadow Odyssey Storyline:

In an age long passed, a band of extraordinary heroes embarked on an epic journey to free Norrath from the clutches of a shrouded threat. Their enduring quest would take them to the far reaches of the globe, delving deep into the most dangerous dungeons and undertaking many daunting trials. This was the Shadow Odyssey, and the heroes were known as the Ethernauts. In their time, this epic quest came to an end, and Norrath was saved. But now ... history is repeating itself. It is time for a new generation of Ethernauts to retrace the steps of their honored predecessors through the ruined, rancorous and twisting regions of Norrath to rid the world of the invading scourge and destroy the renewed evil of the Shadowmen.

Extensive Feature Set:

  • Includes the new expansion pack, plus the entire award winning content from four previously released expansion packs and three adventure packs.
  • Explore up to 80 levels of breathtaking content in more than 350 expansive and dangerous environments both new and nostalgic.
  • Epic tales of the odyssey and the EQII world are told through more than 8,000 quests with over 5,000 savage creatures.
  • Forge your character's destiny by choosing from 19 unique player races and 24 distinct character classes.
  • Customize your character with unique armor sets, exciting weapon advancements, fascinating mounts and collect thousands of items for your home or guild hall.
  • Additional Heritage Quests with unique rewards being added to the current exciting rare loot rewards.
  • The Achievement Point level cap is increased to 200 to offer new achievements for class- specific lines.
  • New progression-based itemization point system offers players more upgrade options and the ability to purchase equipment upgrades.
  • Honor a wide range of deities including two new additions to the world of Norrath - Rodcet Nife and Anashti Sul.
  • Includes Legends of Norrath™ strategic online trading card game, digital starter deck, loot card and booster pack. Legends of Norrath is rated "E10+" for Alcohol Reference, Fantasy Violence, Mild Blood, and Suggestive Themes.
  • Bonus Item: Legends of Norrath Loot Card. Hang the horizontal wall painting of the Ethernauts Airship and receive a rent status reduction of 300 points.

Disclaimer:

30-day subscription included for new accounts only (existing EverQuest II and Station Access accounts are not eligible to receive gameplay included with purchase). Afterwards, a Monthly Subscription Fee of $14.99 applies (plus applicable tax).

This is an Internet-only game which requires players to connect to Sony Online Entertainment's servers via their own Internet connections. Players are responsible for their own Internet connection service and all Internet-related fees. A valid credit card is required to play this game and additional, recurring subscription fees apply.

Installation and play subject to the EverQuest II User Agreement and Software License Agreement, game rules of conduct, SOE's terms of service and SOE's privacy policy. Sony Online Entertainment does not ensure continuous or error-free access, use or availability of any game content, feature, game-play or server and may change, modify, disable, suspend or remove any such content, feature, game-play or server at its sole discretion.

Review Terms and Conditions

name: EverQuest® II The Shadow Odyssey™

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum

  • Operating System: Windows® XP
  • Processor: Pentium® III 1 Ghz or greater
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Video Card: DirectX 9 Compatible video card. Pixel shader and vertex shader compatible hardware with 64MB of texture memory
  • Sound: DirectSound compatible audio hardware
  • Network Connection: 56k Internet Connection
  • Hard Drive Space: 14GB Hard Drive Space

System requirements subject to change as the game progresses and you may need to upgrade your current system (or obtain a new system) to play the game over its lifetime.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended

  • Operating System: Windows® XP, Windows® Vista
  • Processor: Pentium® IV 2 Ghz or greater
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Video Card: DirectX 9 Compatible video card. Pixel shader and vertex shader compatible hardware with 128MB of texture memory or greater
  • Sound: DirectSound compatible audio hardware
  • Network Connection: Broadband Internet Connection
  • Hard Drive Space: 14GB Hard Drive Space

esrb.descriptors:
Suggestive Themes,
Use of Alcohol,
Violence
Online Interactions Not Rated by the ESRB
